title: Quality, comfort, and convenience! All in one great place!
map_address: 1801 N. Green Valley Parkway near Wigwam
posting_body: ['1 & 2  Bedroom Renovated Apartments!', 'UNITS AVAILABLE NOW ON THE 1ST OR 2ND FLOOR', 'CALL US TODAY:', 'show contact info', '1BD/1BA [$1,780 - $1,830]', '725 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'FULLY EQUIPPED KITCHEN WITH STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES', 'FIREPLACE', 'WASHER & DRYER IN UNIT', 'MASTER SUITE WITH WALK-IN CLOSET', 'ROMAN SPA TUB', 'OVERSIZED PATIO OFF THE LIVING ROOM', 'FULL OR EXTENDED HARDWOOD VINYL FLOORING', 'ONE ASSIGNED COVERED CARPORT FOR YOUR VEHICLE', '2BD/2BA [$1,830 - $1,880]', '1035 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'FULLY EQUIPPED KITCHEN WITH STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES', 'WASHER & DRYER IN UNIT', 'MASTER SUITE WITH WALK-IN CLOSET AND ROMAN SPA TUB', 'WALK-IN SHOWER', 'FIREPLACE IN SELECT UNITS', 'OVERSIZED PATIO OFF THE LIVING ROOM', 'FULL OR EXTENDED HARDWOOD VINYL FLOORING', 'ONE ASSIGNED COVERED CARPORT FOR YOUR VEHICLE', 'Our amenities at Invitational Apartments include a 24 HR lap pool with relaxing jacuzzi spa, 24 HR fitness center, volleyball court, pet stations throughout the property, monthly resident activities, assigned covered carport, on-site maintanence, gated community, spartments with views of the legacy golf course & so much more!', 'Schedule a tour today and visit our beautiful green community.', 'OPEN Mon. - Sun. 9AM to 5PM', '<URL>', '1801 N. Green Valley Parkway', 'Henderson NV 89074', 'Managed by Olen Residential', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Come home to a small green gated community -- The Invitational Apartments!', 'Invitational is a happening Henderson community!!!', 'Stop by our office today to find out why you want to live here!', 'Stellar Features Include:', '1 & 2 Bedroom Apartments!', 'Green Golf Course Views', '- Walk', 'In Closets', '-Washer/Dryer In Unit', '- Relaxing Roman Tub', '- Fireplace on select units', '- 24 Amenities: Fitness Room, Swimming Pool and Spa', '- Easy Access to Freeways', '- Monthly Resident Activities', '-Pet Stations Throughout Property', '- On Site Maintenance', '-Gated Community', '- Flat Rate Water/Sewer/Trash', '- Online Payment Options', '- Security Deposit or Low Cost Bond Options', 'We Are Available In The Office....', 'Monday -- Sunday 9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Call today & make an appointment!', 'show contact info', 'Your Furry Friends Are Welcomed!', 'Dogs & Cats Allowed.', '*Call for restricted breeds*', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.', 'Come home to a great community - Invitational!', 'Beds: 1 - 2 / Baths: 1 - 2 / Monthly Rent: $1,750- $1,880.', 'Security Deposit: 500 O.A.C.']
